name: CEDAR DataDump
body: ### Welcome Welcome to the website of the Dutch Census. This website provides access to all tables of the census published between 1795 and 1971. Additionally, most explanations, introductions and appendices will be available digitally soon (see meanwhile the legacy documentation). In total, more than 40,000 pages, originally published in more than 200 books, are​accessible. Three projects have been working in the digitization of the censuses since 1997. The census tables are available in the following formats: - Comma-separated Values (CSV) - RDF, following the RDF Data Cube vocabulary schema - MS Excel - MS Excel with TabLinker markup   ### Previous releases This is a refactored version of the [volkstellingen.nl](http://www.volkstellingen.nl/) website. The migration of some contents is still pendant: - [] Documentation pages - [] Images of scanned materials   The authoritative source for data from the 1795-1971 censuses is the online archiving system [EASY](http://easy.dans.knaw.nl) of [DANS](http://www.dans.knaw.nl). ### Download To download the full dataset, click one of the following links: - [Tarball](https://github.com/CEDAR-project/DataDump/tarball/master) - [Zip](https://github.com/CEDAR-project/DataDump/zipball/master) Links to files of specific censuses will be available soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
